items.title: Why The Future Of Trucking Litigation Is An Expert Arms Race
items.description: A quiet revolution is reshaping America’s trucking industry, and it’s about to transform how trucking accident cases are fought in courtrooms across t...

items.title: UFC Cuts Ties With Ranked Veteran And Fans Are Baffled
items.description: UFC releases No. 10-ranked Viviane Araujo despite recent win and solid résumé, raising questions about what the promotion values in veteran fighters.

items.title: India’s Economic Juggernaut On Way To Becoming The 3rd Largest Economy
items.description: India is projected to add $1 trillion to its GDP every 12–18 months to 2047. With this momentum, India is targeting a $30 trillion economy by 2047.

items.title: ‘Tenchu’ Studio ACQUIRE And Red Dunes Games Unveil Global Co-Dev Deal
items.description: In a rare move, Japan's Acquire Corp has entered a multi-year partnership with UAE-based Red Dunes Games to co-develop a range of original IPs.
